extension.dc:title: GBIF Relevé
extension.name: Releve
extension.dc:description: Support for vegetation plot survey (relevé) measurements ancillary to those reported using Event core with Occurrence extension. Note all coverage measurements are in percentage.

property.name: project
property.dc:description: The name or code for the project associated with the relevé

property.name: syntaxonName
property.dc:description: The description (not a code) of the plant community or vegetation unit associated with the relevé

property.name: aspect
property.dc:description: The compass direction that the relevé site faces

property.name: inclinationInDegrees
property.dc:description: The angle of inclination of the relevé site in degrees, rounded to the nearest whole number

property.name: coverTotalInPercentage
property.dc:description: The total cover (%) of all plants, rounded to the nearest hundredth (2 decimal places)

property.name: coverTreesInPercentage
property.dc:description: The cover (%) of trees, rounded to the nearest hundredth (2 decimal places)

property.name: coverShrubsInPercentage
property.dc:description: The cover (%) of shrubs, rounded to the nearest hundredth (2 decimal places)

property.name: coverHerbsInPercentage
property.dc:description: The cover (%) of the herb layer, rounded to the nearest hundredth (2 decimal places)

property.name: coverCryptogamsInPercentage
property.dc:description: The cover (%) of cryptogams, rounded to the nearest hundredth (2 decimal places)

property.name: coverMossesInPercentage
property.dc:description: The cover (%) of mosses, rounded to the nearest hundredth (2 decimal places)

property.name: coverLichensInPercentage
property.dc:description: The cover (%) of lichens, rounded to the nearest hundredth (2 decimal places)

property.name: coverAlgaeInPercentage
property.dc:description: The cover (%) of algae, rounded to the nearest hundredth (2 decimal places)

property.name: coverLitterInPercentage
property.dc:description: The cover (%) of litter, rounded to the nearest hundredth (2 decimal places)

property.name: coverWaterInPercentage
property.dc:description: The cover (%) of open water, rounded to the nearest hundredth (2 decimal places)

property.name: coverRockInPercentage
property.dc:description: The cover (%) of bare rock, rounded to the nearest hundredth (2 decimal places)

property.name: treeLayerHeightInMeters
property.dc:description: The height in meters of the tree layer, rounded to the nearest whole number

property.name: shrubLayerHeightInMeters
property.dc:description: The height in meters of the shrub layer, can be written in decimal notation

property.name: herbLayerHeightInCentimeters
property.dc:description: The height in centimeters of the high herb layer, rounded to the nearest whole number

property.name: mossesIdentified
property.dc:description: The value is true if mosses in the releve were identified

property.name: lichensIdentified
property.dc:description: The value is true if lichens in the releve were identified
